Deal Details Travel Dates 20 July 2026 Sale Ends Dec 31, 2025 Priced From $12,705 per person Enquire Now BLACK FRIDAY BONUS: Includes Savings of 45% PLUS US$500 Shipboard Credit per stateroom! Journey from Lisbon to London with immersive overnight stays that let you dive deeper into Europe’s most captivating cities. Linger in Bordeaux, Paris, Bruges, and Amsterdam, where multiple days in port offer time to savor world-class wines, stroll romantic boulevards, and uncover hidden treasures before returning to the luxury and comfort of your ship. Pricing Deluxe Veranda Suite (Cat G) From $12,705* per person twin share Concierge Suite (E) - (pictured) From $14,113* per person twin share Concierge Suites & higher include: 1-Night pre-cruise Hotel Package^ ^Terms and conditions apply. Highlights This voyage is an Immersive Overnight sailing, meaning it features immersive overnight stays in iconic ports so you can enjoy more time ashore and create unforgettable moments. Overnight in Bordeaux (France) and experience the charm of this enchanting town with time to savor its world-famous wines, stroll along elegant boulevards, and discover the UNESCO-listed Old Town. An overnight stay lets you immerse yourself in the city’s vibrant culture and nearby vineyard excursions. With two full days in Paris (France), you’ll have time to explore the City of Light and admire icons like the Eiffel Tower and the Louvre, while also enjoying leisurely moments in charming cafés and along the Seine. Staying overnight ensures you can see Paris both by day and illuminated at night. What's Included Always included in all Suites: Unlimited Shore Excursions Exquisite Dining, Including All Speciality Restaurants Unlimited Drinks, Fine Wines, Craft Cocktails, Speciality Coffees and More Customisable In-Suite Mini Bar Replenished Daily With Your Preferences Unlimited Access to Spa Facilities Pre-Paid Gratuities Unlimited Wifi Valet Laundry Service 24-Hour In-Suite Dining Open Bars and Lounges and Dynamic Entertainment and Enrichment Concierge Suites and Higher always include: 1-Night Pre-Cruise Hotel package Priority online reservations for shore excursions and specialty dining Additional savings on Regent Choice Experiences and Land Programmes Penthouse Suites and Higher always include: Personal Butler for and elevated in-suite experience Daily Canapes Itinerary Day 1 Lisbon, Portugal Day 2 Cruising the Atlantic Ocean Day 3 Cruising the Bay of Biscay Day 4 Bordeaux, France Day 5 Bordeaux, France Day 6 Cruising the Bay of Biscay Day 7 Paris (Le Havre), France Day 8 Paris (Le Havre), France Day 9 Cruising the English Channel Day 10 Bruges (Zeebrugge), Belgium Day 11 Bruges (Zeebrugge), Belgium Day 12 Amsterdam (Ijmuiden), Netherlands Day 13 Amsterdam (Ijmuiden), Netherlands Day 14 Cruising the North Sea Day 15 London (Southampton), England Your Ship Seven Seas Voyager®: Designed for Every Refined Moment Every suite aboard Seven Seas Voyager® features a private balcony, elegant marble-accented bathrooms, and spacious closets—creating the perfect sanctuary at sea. Start your day with coffee or unwind with a glass of wine, enjoying alfresco dining with endless ocean views and fresh sea breezes. Crafted for a truly holistic experience, Seven Seas Voyager® brings all-inclusive luxury to life. From world-class dining to the serenity of your own private space, every detail is designed to make your journey as enriching and effortless as the destinations you explore. Terms & Conditions BLACK FRIDAY BONUS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: On select sailings and suite categories, guests will receive UP TO 45% OFF the cruise-only fare (discount already reflected in the fare). Offer is capacity controlled and applies to new bookings only made between 1 November 2025 and 31 December 2025. The UP TO 45% OFF discount applies to select suite categories by ship as follows: Concierge Suite (D) and below on Seven Seas Mariner®, Seven Seas Explorer®, Seven Seas Splendor® and Seven Seas Grandeur®. Penthouse Suite (A) and below on Seven Seas Voyager® and Seven Seas Navigator®. For bookings made between 1 November 2025 and 2 December 2025, guests will also receive US$250 Shipboard Credit per guest, up to US$500 per suite, on select sailings. BLACK FRIDAY OFFER applies to all select voyages included in the Gift of Travel promotion regardless of suite category. Availability is limited and restrictions apply. Applicable voyages are subject to removal at any time without notice. Savings and Shipboard Credit amounts are subject to change. Offers may be withdrawn at any time without prior notice. Offers may not be combinable with other promotions Experience the world differently.
